post.body: I'm Starting 2009 today...
Bs doesn't like twitter....RAT BASTARD
Its raining in vegas. My wife and kids are playing guitar hero while im chilling... Sounds like the start of a disney movie.
Productive day... Ran cable at the office, shipped packages for hhs, napped, currently DJing, fixed DMS problem while djing. Now... Wash ...
There is a dude doing the WORST crip walk I have ever seen.
Another night at polly ...
At my sons doctor appt. We think he has asthma. This kid is my retirement plan. Asthma is not acceptable ....
How did we ever get shit done without the internet?
Come on OBAMA.....
At the las Vegas renaissance fair... Looks like the extras from braveheart and pirates of the Caribbean
I totally fucked up our company ebay acct.
I gotta start getting ready for my 5k run and 1/2 marathon....
at polly esthers starting the night out with southern comfort ad coke...
At my sons karate class.
Polly was off the hook last night.
At the club first time with kueit...WOW
Today I fell victim to the pitfalls of having a home office...
Did tryst thursday...did a really good job.. Really good ...
Im at circus circus eating at the buffet....don't ask
Playing tourist with my wife out on th town... $25 rooms at te stratosphere!
At tryst just opened for Justin....now im waiting for 3 hrs...to get back on. Gotta learn the art of napping...
Alex Gaudino is my new fav house remixer..
Chilling at the roosevelt....
On la brea and hollywood thinking of "back in the day"
I. Hollywood doing a microsoft xmas party.
My son koby one of the twins just got a huge gash in the back of his head. 5 staples... A lot of crying.
Haven't bought one xmas gift yet....
Rockin xs right now
Getting to dj at XS. Oh boy
Drinking hypnotic and cranberry reminecing about club ra
Back to tryst I go.
I think I'm up ready to do this all over again
Wow just finished.... Happy mother Fucken new year
Need another red bull
Looks like I may be able to do something big. The crowd isn't drunk yet and there ready to go
Back at tryst.... I love vegas!
Just saw jenna jamison pregnant
Just finished my first drink ... Just called shelly...did my first set at tryst and I'm looking at the line at XS.... WOWOWOWOWO
Parked at pallazzo walked to tryst my plan is working!
Getting ready for nye.... Grand opening of XS
Playing monopoly with my wife and kids...
Winding down work day wishing for 5 more hours in the day
the worst table at XS for NYE is going for 7K!!!! Don't ask what the best table goes for... And the club is sold out
Just did 2nd soft opening at XS - Encore Las Vegas A lot of good comments a lot of props.... 2009 is shaping up nice
I'm attempting to wake up. The DJ sleep pattern are coming back...
Just did 2nd soft opening at XS at encore... Incredible club.....
Watching the orphange ....scary movie!
